meanings.definition: The quality or state of being insufferable.
meanings.sent1: The insufferableness of the heat made it impossible to stay outside for long.
meanings.sent2: The insufferableness of the noise in the classroom made it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent3: The insufferableness of the situation was so extreme that it almost seemed comical.
meanings.sent4: The insufferableness of waiting in line felt like an eternity.
meanings.sent5: The insufferableness of the smell was overwhelming and unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The condition of being intolerable or unbearable.
meanings.sent1: The insufferableness of the pain in his leg made it difficult to walk.
meanings.sent2: The insufferableness of the traffic during rush hour was frustrating.
meanings.sent3: The insufferableness of the movie's plot twists kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: The insufferableness of the silence in the room was deafening.
meanings.sent5: The insufferableness of the cold made her shiver uncontrollably.
